Posts.Content: Hello, I am stage IV with mets to liver, lung & spine. I am not in remission nut stable. The chemo has been working. I have strong faith & that's what keepsake going strong. Keep the faiths friend. There is a lot of treatment out there to have us living active lives for yrs to come. Good luck thru all the testing. That is the hardest part; the wait. God bless!
Posts.Title: Newbie - PET Scan Showing lesions in bone of Spine
